nodes.text: Nar Shaddaa wind chimes were a type of wind-activated percussion instrument that originated on Nar Shaddaa. Jabba Desilijic Tiure owned a set of such windchimes, which was hung in the archway of the main entrance to his palace's throne room. When Leia Organa, disguised as Boushh, came to rescue Han Solo from the palace in 4 ABY, she accidentally knocked the wind chimes with her helmet.
